I was on your gig in Zagreb Croatia long time ago

Super cool!  After two totally fucked up and lost Corona years, it was really incredibly beautiful, exhausting, exciting, fun and liberating!  And when people write here that the sound sucks, then I'll just quote: If you have no idea, just shut up!  I was there and the live sound at Sacred Reich was very well mixed, as is the case here in the recording or that was the live stream!  Two guitars very well audible and defined, no mud, the solos very well and clearly audible in the stereo sound image.  Bass super good üëç Drums a bit too few overheads or cymbals audible.  Singing great!  All in all a really good live mix!  That was much worse at the Rock Hard Festival, to put it politely, whoever was there in 2008 will surely remember the Testament show!  It was really cruel, even as a die-hard fan it was unbearable, so if someone writes here that the sound is bad on this Sacred Reich show, either they weren't there or they're deaf!
